entry.title: Arunsp03/Code-Judge: A lightweight online coding platform inspired by LeetCode and Codeforces. Users can pick a problem and write solutions in Python or JavaScript, which are then executed securely using the Judge0 API.

entry.title: blessedux/Dobber_agent_launchpad: DOBBER is a lightweight, modular agent framework that lets AI securely manage revenue-generating DePIN devices. Built for real-world automation, it enables on-chain coordination, reward routing, and intelligent operations—turning physical machines into autonomous digital businesses.
entry.content: DOBBER is a lightweight, modular agent framework that lets AI securely manage revenue-generating DePIN devices. Built for real-world automation, it enables on-chain coordination, reward routing, and intelligent operations—turning physical machines into autonomous digital businesses.

entry.title: SeyZiiZ/Local-Dapp-TestNet: Lightweight complete Dapp wallet built with Solidity and powered by Hardhat, designed for testing smart contracts on a local blockchain environment. It includes seamless integration with MetaMask and supports multiple local wallets for a smooth development and testing workflow. Admin Panel, GPT Wrapper & more
entry.content: Lightweight complete Dapp wallet built with Solidity and powered by Hardhat, designed for testing smart contracts on a local blockchain environment. It includes seamless integration with MetaMask and supports multiple local wallets for a smooth development and testing workflow. Admin Panel, GPT Wrapper & more
